description: Hides inactive code regions including #ifdef, #else, and preprocessor directives, making code easier to read even in files with many conditional compilation blocks.
command.toggle.title: Toggle #ifdef Regions Visibility
configuration.title: Hide #ifdef Regions
configuration.enabled.description: Enable hiding of inactive code regions on startup.
configuration.opacity.description: Opacity level for hidden regions (0 = invisible, 1 = fully visible).
